1.content: How does our protagonist gain the power?
1.title: The start

111.content:
"You shouldn't have gone out." Jessica told Kevin as she returned to cleaning the house.

"Yeah, yeah." Keven mumbled as he walked down the stairs to the basement. This was part of a yearly routine he hated to do. The dreaded cleaning of the house. Every year on the first day of spring Kevin's mom made them all clean part of the house. His mom would clean the living room, his sister the kitchen, Kevin upstairs, Jacob the basement and his father the garden. This was something of an ongoing tradition he hated. That's why Kevin thought he could escape his chores by going to Josh that morning. Sadly when he returned home he found his mother standing on the front porch, her arms crossing her chest. While Kevin was spending his time with Josh, Jacob cleaned upstairs. So the only thing left to clean was the basement.

"Man, it stinks." Kevin smelled the washing machine as his mom had already cleaned it. Kevin quickly opened the small window taking in some fresh air. Still, the funky smell stayed in the air. Trying to figure out where it came from, Kevin moved some boxes around. When he pushed the last box out of his way he found out what it was. Lying in a corner was a chalice; a golden chalice covered in jewels.

Frowning his eyebrows Kevin took a closer look at the chalice. That thing looked pretty valuable. Maybe they could sell it online and fetch some money for it. Kevin assumed they wouldn't buy anything for him alone, but a new 4K television would be to the benefit of everyone. Grinning, Kevin grabbed the chalice to take it with him. And that moment it happened. Kevin felt a power coming from the chalice, it felt like a bolt of electricity was coursing through his body. His mind only thought of letting go of the thing, but his hands wouldn't let go off the thing. Kevin thought his live would come to an end when suddenly he felt being taken away, like he was floating on the air. The only thing he couldn't do was steer. Not knowing whether to enjoy the flight or to cower in fear, Kevin felt his body floating back up the stairs. He closed his eyes as he expected to crash through the door, but nothing like it happened. Instead when Kevin was in the hallway, he saw someone standing and before he knew it, he crashed into the person.

Who was this person?
111.title: Kevin (brother/son)

info.brief_description: Our protagonist can possess bodies but not entirely control them.
info.description:
In this story the protagonist has the power, whether it be Sci-Fi or magically attained, to possess people. However, with the catch they they cannot control the body. In the "standard" storyline, the protagonist can influence and tap into the mind of the host body, making them able to communicate with each other if they want to. Or the protagonist could use it to gather information and memories for their own plans.

You can change this in new storylines or make minor adjustments! Also feel free to add characters to the list, this is just the base.


Rules:

- No scat
- No child pornography


Characters:

Kevin Anderson - 18 years old, one of the sons of the family. Has a crush from school and has never been with a girl. Partially due to his shyness. Average size and short brown hair, looks like the typical late teen guy really.

Jacob Anderson - 14 years old, the youngest in the familly. A bit rebellious when he doesn't get things his way.

Susan Anderson - 20 years old, the oldest of the family and the only daughter. Sees her brothers as annoying brats. Has a boyfriend. Long black hair.

Paul Anderson - 40 years old, the father of family. Works normal 8-hour shifts. Doesn't have an athletic body but is by no means small. Black short hair and rarely shaves off his beard.

Jessica Anderson - 38 years old, the mother of the family. Typical housewife, is very sweet and still got the looks despite two births. Blonde shoulder-length hair.

Amanda - 19 years old, Kevin's crush. Red long hair and already has a boyfriend. Lives not far away, but not exactly on the same street.

Rebecca - 20 years old, Amanda's best friend. A bit of a dull girl compared to Amanda. Short blonde hair.

Josh - 18 years old, one of Kevin's childhood friends. Also has never been with a girl.


If the story blows up I may add characters on here. Other than that, happy reading/adding!
